content.raw:
The reason I chose SDF was because:

1. It's easy to distribute via the model repository
1. We make use of more of the simulation infrastructure
1. ROS is not needed or used by teams.

That said, anyone if free to make a URDF. However that version cannot go into the gazebo model database, so we'd have to put it in the handsim package.
